entry.title: SilTex Polygiene Performance Mask (Black Camo)
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Face Mask
Price: 9.95

  • 2-Ply Design 
  • Cooling Technology
  • Antibacterial Odor-Block
  • Quick Dry
  • UV 50+ 

Maximize your comfort and protection with the antibacterial SilTex Performance Mask, constructed with 2 layers of fabric. The layers are treated with Polygiene®, a sustainable antibacterial finish using Silver Salt (Silver chloride) that prevents the growth of odor-causing microbes: bacteria, fungus and mildew. The inner layer, made with a 76% Nylon + 24% Polyester blend, provides a cool to the touch effect. Train at ease with the lightweight design, pliable nose guard, adjustable straps and Polygiene® storage bag. 

Care: Machine wash cold and air dry.

Size: Available in two sizes: Regular: (6.5" Length, 9” Width) & Small: (5.75" Length, 8.25" Width)
